text: Dana Jones (born June 26, 1976) is a Democratic member of the Maryland House of Delegates appointed in April 2020 to replace Alice J. Cain. Jones is the current communications vice president for the Junior League of Annapolis. She previously was the research director for EMILY's List and was a legislative aide to then-U.S. Representative (now Senator ) Ben Cardin (D-MD). She helped Anne Arundel County Executive Steuart Pittman with debate preparation during his 2018 campaign and was campaign manager for Robert Zirkin's House of Delegates campaign in the 1998 election. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1976 births Category:21st-century American politicians Category:21st- century American women politicians Category:Living people Category:Maryland Democrats Category:Members of the Maryland House of Delegates Category:Towson University alumni Category:Women state legislators in Maryland
title: Dana Jones (politician)
